Sleep Algorithm documentation

Overview on running this project¶

  1. Either install a Python IDE or create a Python virtual environment to install the packages required

  2. Install packages required

Setup procedure¶

  1. Create a Python Virtual Environment

    • Install virtualenv:

      pip install virtualenv

    • Create virtialenv:

      py -m venv <name of virtualenv>

    • Activate virtualenv:

      .\<name of virtualenv>\Scripts\activate

    • Install requirements:

      pip install -r requirements.txt

  2. Loading sql file into database

    • Activate virtualenv:

      .\<name of virtualenv>\Scripts\activate
    • Create username and password in postgresql

    • Creating database

      python manage.py dbshell 
    
      CREATE DATABASE <name of database>;

    • Loading dump

      psql -d <database name> -U <username> -f <path to dump file>

    • Entering details in environment

      Enter the following in tranquil_server\tranquil_server\.env
    DEBUG=off
    ENGINE='django.db.backends.postgresql'
    DB_NAME='<database name>'
    USER_NAME='<username>'
    PASSWORD='<password>'
    HOST_NAME='localhost'
    PORT='5432'

  3. Running the project

    • Running the tranquil_server

      Go to tranquil_server\ and activate the virtual environment
      
    python manage.py runserver

    • Running the report_service

      Go to report_service\ and activate the virtual environment
      
      flask run

Code Documentation¶

    1. Obtaining sleep category¶

    Movesense.obtain_slp_category(old_firmware_version)[source]¶
    Description

    Computing where undergoing sleep or activity every minute

    Parameters

    • old_firmware_version – compare and check firmware versions.

    Returns

    List of activities present each minute

    2. Computing sleep stages¶

    Movesense.obtain_sleep_stages_cluster()[source]¶
    Description

    Calculating different stages of sleep undergone in their sleep cycle

    Returns

    List containing sleep stages each minute
